title: What should I do with my life now and over the next 5-10 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: So I am a 21 year old kid who just got suspended from a CSU in Southern California for a year. I'm about a sophomore and a half as a Mechanical Engineering major and I'm looking to take summer classes/classes at a different institution to catch up. I also enjoy DJ'ing and am learning to mix/master House/EDM music. I have had sex 1 time since turning 18 and would like more of that, but I don't seem to click with anyone besides this one girl who I fell deeply in love with since I was 19 and she's who got me suspended because I wouldn't leave her alone (media-wise/digital-contact wise). I just got over a phase of psychosis that lasted until just recently after taking 8 tabs of strong acid in a year. I've done plenty of drugs (nothing with needles or crack or meth or extremely fatal shit). I've already met many people and I have experienced lots of things like a DUI (on record), suspension from school (on record), and partying (off-record lol). I feel like i'm set back because of this suspension and I have a few passions like: JDM'ing my Honda Civic, music, DJ'ing, staying healthy, finishing my Mechanical Engineering degree and becoming a famous EDM artist. I am also very healthy and sober, but sometimes I want to do drugs and have sex. But haven't in about 2 years. My dreams are to drive a JDM'd Honda Civic which I'm almost close to, becoming a professional producer which I believe I can do within 5 years, and working as a hot shot in a large building for engineering. Oh ya, I also want to get laid a lot by girls but I'm afraid I'll never fall in love with another girl (referring to the one who got me expelled). I am about to turn 22 and I'm goodlooking, 5'10", smart, and artistic. I tend to panic though and feel like I'll never become anything if I'm not pursuing my goals 24/7 and I lost lots of friends now. Almost all my 500+ friends I made in college think I'm weird or crazy. But I'm just nice and feel the need to work to become successful. Why am I so lonely? And will I have time to become successful? And if I want to be somewhat successful when I'm older what should I do now? Haha am I worrying too much? Please give me life advice so I can have sex, do very seldom drugs, have friends, be successful, and accomplish my dreams.
Look at what draws your hunger. And push through those years as learning for that idea.What you discover with what you’re wanting to do. Create a unique way of doing it.
